video.title: Terra Nova
video.synopsis: The Shannon family travels with other settlers from the scorched Earth of the 22nd century to establish a colony in the prehistoric past.

episodes.synopsis: Jim Shannon, a devoted father with a checkered past, guides his family through Terra Nova, the first colony in a beautiful yet foreboding land.
episodes.title: Genesis: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The rebellious Sixers try to negotiate a deal with Terra Nova, and Jim goes in search of Josh and his friends, who have come under attack by slashers.
episodes.title: Genesis: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Jim and Taylor scramble to defend the colony against a horde of pterosaurs, and Elisabeth discovers that an old boyfriend also resides in Terra Nova.
episodes.title: Instinct

episodes.synopsis: Elisabeth tries to find a cure for a lethal virus afflicting the colony, and Josh schemes to get his girlfriend included on a future pilgrimage.
episodes.title: What Remains

episodes.synopsis: A young Sixers girl seeks asylum in Terra Nova, but is she a clandestine agent for Mira? Meanwhile, Reynolds confesses his attraction to Maddy.
episodes.title: The Runaway

episodes.synopsis: Jim discovers that a recent death was actually murder, and Josh secretly turns to the Sixers for help bringing his girlfriend to Terra Nova.
episodes.title: Bylaw

episodes.synopsis: A crashing meteor wipes out all technology and wreaks havoc on the colony, and the Sixers attack Terra Nova to retrieve a mysterious box.
episodes.title: Nightfall

episodes.synopsis: Josh ponders betraying his family to secure passage for his girlfriend to Terra Nova, and Taylor tries to expose the Sixers mole within the colony.
episodes.title: Proof

episodes.synopsis: When Jim finds a dead body buried under a tree, suspicious eyes turn to Taylor, who reveals the original, secret purpose of Terra Nova.
episodes.title: Vs

episodes.synopsis: When slashers attack in the jungle, Taylor and Mira must team up to survive. Meanwhile, the Sixers mole barely eludes capture.
episodes.title: Now You See Me

episodes.synopsis: The Sixers mole is unveiled, and the colony learns that the imminent 11th pilgrimage from 2149 will be accompanied by a surprise attack.
episodes.title: Within

episodes.synopsis: As the 11th pilgrimage commences, a vicious Phoenix Group army overruns Terra Nova and begins devastating the colony and the surrounding landscape.
episodes.title: Occupation

episodes.synopsis: As the Phoenix Group continues its devastation, Jim concocts a daring scheme to destroy its connection to the future and drive it from Terra Nova.
episodes.title: Resistance
